document_data.caption: A map showing Duir's Alley and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Duir's Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Duir's Alley''' was a small alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Duir's Alley was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It connected the [[Street of Bells]] in the west with the [[Street of the Sword]] in the east via passing through a neighborhood of buildings. [[Lhoril's Alley]] branched off of the southern side of Duir's Alley.
document_data.Activities: Patrons of the [[Elfstone Tavern]] often exited the building's rear onto Duir's Alley where they displayed their magical prowess.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Hilmer Storage]]
* [[Halls of Hilmer]]
* Elftsone Tavern
* [[Halambar Lutes & Harps]]
